document_data.name: Rage
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rage''''' was a [[spell]] that made the targets violently angry. and was associated with [[Malar]] while the later-developed [[arcane]] version was included within the school of [[enchantment]] and the sub-school of [[compulsion]].
document_data.Effects:
''Rage'' instilled rage inside the targets. This rage was similar to that of a [[barbarian]]; while it was not as effective it also was not as exhausting.

The divine version of the spell significantly increased the might of the individual it affected.
document_data.Components: While the divine version of this spell required only [[verbal component]]s, the arcane variety also had a [[somatic component]].
